meta-runner.name: PSCI: JMeter wait
meta-runner.description: Waits until JMeter process finishes and ensures it succeeded.

param.name: jmeter.rootPath
param.spec: text description='Path to root JMeter directory' label='Path to JMeter' display='normal'

param.name: jmeter.jtlFile
param.spec: text description='Path to the JMeter JTL file (output)' validationMode='not_empty' label='Path to JTL file' display='normal'

param.name: jmeter.timeToWait
param.spec: text description='Timeout (in seconds) for JMeter process. After this time the process will be killed and the build will fail.' validationMode='any' label='Time to wait' display='normal'

param.name: jmeter.port
param.spec: text description='The port where jmeter in non-GUI mode is listening on.' validationMode='regex' regexp='\d*' label='JMeter port' display='normal'

param.name: jmeter.shutdownmode
param.spec: select label_1='Kils JMeter process explicitly' data_1='KillProcess' label_2='Run the Shutdown client to stop a non-GUI instance gracefully' data_2='SendShutdownMessage' label_3='Run the Shutdown client to stop a non-GUI instance abruptly' data_3='SendStopTestNowMessage' display='normal' label='Shutdown mode'

param.name: jmeter.enabled
param.spec: text description='Put false if this whole step should not run.' validationMode='any' label='Enabled' display='normal'
